translations: v.搭建，建造；使竖立，竖起；创立，建立；安装，装配；（使）勃起
adj.竖直的，直立的；竖起的；勃起的，坚挺的

phrs.translation: 竖起, 竖立, 安装, 直立
均衡器位置调整, 均衡器, 位置调整
竖立, 直立, 屹立, 笔直地站着

sentences.sentence: They plan to erect an apartment house on that property.
sentences.translation: 他们计划在那片地产上建造一座公寓楼。

sentences.sentence: Your job, as captain of your soul, is to erect dams to keep these passions in check.
sentences.translation: 作为灵魂的船长，你的工作就是竖起堤坝来控制这些激情。

sentences.sentence: Police had to erect barriers to keep crowds back.
sentences.translation: 警察只得设立路障来阻截人群。
